statements: SELECT * FROM GameSettings WHERE setting_id = 1;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM GameSettings WHERE setting_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM GameSettings WHERE setting_value ->> 'type' = 'general';
SELECT setting_name FROM GameSettings WHERE setting_value ->> 'status' = 'active' ORDER BY setting_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameSettings WHERE setting_id IN (3, 4, 5);
SELECT * FROM GameSettings WHERE setting_id = 1;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM GameSettings WHERE setting_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM GameSettings WHERE setting_value->>'difficulty' = 'hard' ORDER BY setting_id DESC;
SELECT setting_id, setting_name FROM GameSettings WHERE setting_value->'options'->>'sound' = 'on' ORDER BY setting_id ASC;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM GameSettings WHERE setting_value->>'mod_date' > '2022-01-01' AND setting_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY setting_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_designers_settings WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT designer_name, design_style FROM game_designers_settings WHERE design_style = 'Retro';
SELECT setting_data FROM game_designers_settings WHERE setting_data->>'music' = 'electronic';
SELECT * FROM player_settings WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_preferences FROM player_settings WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT designer_name, design_style FROM game_designers_settings
SELECT * FROM player_settings WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_name DESC
SELECT player_name, player_preferences->'theme' AS preferred_theme FROM player_settings WHERE player_preferences->'difficulty' = 'Hard'
SELECT designer_name, setting_data->'resolution' AS preferred_resolution FROM game_designers_settings WHERE design_style = 'RPG'
SELECT * FROM game_designers_settings JOIN player_settings ON designer_id = player_level

SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_settings WHERE player_level > 10;
